product_name: Vasque Breeze 2.0 Mid GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: These Vasque Breeze 2.0 Mid GTX hiking boots will breeze through the miles, thanks to Gore-Tex(R) protection and a nimble, supportive design. Mid-height uppers boast resilient 2mm thick nubuck leather and airy nylon mesh panels to supply rugged, flexible and lightweight performance. Gusseted, padded tongues keep out trail debris and relieve pressure from lacing across insteps. Gore-Tex waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Wicking nylon mesh linings absorb excess moisture and disperse it for fast drying. Dual-density EVA footbeds and molded EVA midsoles absorb shock, provide cushioning and return energy back to feet for all-day comfort. Thermoplastic urethane plates embedded in the midsoles enhance stability and support. Aggressive Vibram Contact rubber outsoles on these Vasque Breeze 2.0 Mid GTX hiking boots supply stability and traction on demanding terrain.
short_description: These Vasque Breeze 2.0 Mid GTX hiking boots will breeze through the miles, thanks to Gore-Tex(R) protection and a nimble, supportive design.
